document_data.name: Yseldre
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Yseldre''' was a noble of [[Solon]] during the time of the Solonese empire.
document_data.Relationships: He was the father of [[Tiphera tir-Yseldre]].

History.Legacy: Lord Yseldre was survived only by his daughter Tiphera, who later sought revenge against the wyrm and ultimately slew it.
